layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x136

    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x112
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 296x19
          text run at (0,0) width 296: "The table caption should be aligned at the bottom"

          LayoutText {#text} at (24,0) size 70x19
            text run at (24,0) width 70: "CAPTION"

          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 116x24
